carts-delete.title: Delete confirmation
carts-delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete selected carts?

cart-save.title: Save changes
cart-save.message: The cart has been modified. Do you want to save changes?

EnableDeleteObsoleteCarts.title: Hard delete for previously soft deleted carts
EnableDeleteObsoleteCarts.description: Enable/ disable periodic deletion of obsolete carts from the database

PortionDeleteObsoleteCarts.title: Number of carts deleted per transaction
PortionDeleteObsoleteCarts.description: Specify how many carts are deleted in a single transaction. Larger values may slow down the database

MaximumCountPerDeleteObsoleteCartsJobExe.title: Maximum carts deleted per job execution
MaximumCountPerDeleteObsoleteCartsJobExe.description: Specify the maximum number of carts deleted during one job run. Higher values increase job duration

CronDeleteObsoleteCarts.title: Cron expression for cart hard delete job
CronDeleteObsoleteCarts.description: Specify when the cart deletion job should run

HardDeleteDelayDays.title: Time-to-live for soft-deleted carts (days)
HardDeleteDelayDays.description: Deletion of carts marked for removal more than the specified number of days ago

Enable.title: Notifications about abandoned carts
Enable.description: Enable/ disable email notifications about the items abandoned in the cart

CronExpression.title: Cron expression for periodic notification sending
CronExpression.description: Specify when to send notifications about abandoned carts

HoursUntilCartAbandoned.title: Abandonment threshold (hours)
HoursUntilCartAbandoned.description: Number of hours after which the cart is considered abandoned if it has not been cleared or purchased during this time

AbandonedCartEmailNotification.description: The customer will receive an email notification about the items abandoned in the cart.
